name: Headlong Rush
entries: You embolden yourself with heroism. For the duration, your speed and jump distance/height is doubled when moving directly towards a hostile creature. After finishing moving, you can use your action to immediately make a melee weapon attack against a creature. On a hit, they take {@dice 2d8} bludgeoning damage + your spellcasting modifier and are knocked prone.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you deal an additional {@dice 1d8} bludgeoning damage for every slot above 1st.
